flavor_text_entries.x:
The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon,
it lives in damp, shady places, so its
body doesn’t dry out.
flavor_text_entries.y:
It’s covered in a slimy membrane that makes
any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.
flavor_text_entries.omega-ruby:
The weakest Dragon-type Pokémon,
it lives in damp, shady places, so its
body doesn’t dry out.
flavor_text_entries.alpha-sapphire:
It’s covered in a slimy membrane that makes
any punches or kicks slide off it harmlessly.
flavor_text_entries.sun:
The weakest of all Dragon-type Pokémon,
it’s unable to breathe if its skin dries out,
so it sticks to shady places.
flavor_text_entries.moon:
Its source of protection is its slimy, germ-laden
mucous membrane. Anyone who touches it
needs some thorough hand-washing.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-sun:
It uses its horns to check out its surroundings.
They’re very sensitive, so if you grab them, it
will feel a strong shock and be unable to move.
flavor_text_entries.ultra-moon:
Its body is mostly water. If it dries out, it will
die, so it’s always sitting with perfect stillness
in the shade.
flavor_text_entries.sword:
Because most of its body is water, it will dry up if
the weather becomes too arid. It’s considered
the weakest dragon Pokémon.
flavor_text_entries.shield:
Their horns are powerful sensors. As soon as
Goomy pick up any sign of enemies, they go into
hiding. This is how they’ve survived.
flavor_text_entries.legends-arceus:
Goomy hides away in the shade of trees, where it's nice and
humid. If the slime coating its body dries out, the Pokémon
instantly becomes lethargic.
